title: Pool Party Taric Heading to the PBE
body:
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_1l8obImQmA/V3F9Z8MV3_I/AAAAAAAA8FI/Kcj-ALPCPoY5cTeaAgFtgYIg6qihz4XBgCLcB/s1600/Taric_Splash_4.jpg
Soon to be followed by Pool Party Miss Fortune and Fiora
Will update post when they come in

replies.body: http://26.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m3j6jxsxKq1runq5ao1_500.gif
peep that braum in the corner {{champion:201}}
More importantly, Draven hired a plane to fly a banner of himself.
#Pool Party Braum 2017
Look at {{champion:201}} fangirling over there lmao

According to KateyKhaos, Taric can take the jacket on and off.
Also, Miss Fortune's Q fires a Beach Ball, and her W rains coconuts.
Taric throws off his jacket during his recall.
Please a toggle like Night Hunter Rengar's  taunt!

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QTOEm0t0,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-06-27T21:53:29.779+0000)
>
> Taric throws off his jacket during his recall.

Can you guys make it a toggle so that I can rock the Rift with my sheer manliness and a bare chest?
I agree 100% this needs to be a toggle, Taric is too sexy to wear a jacket 90% of the time.

#Upvotefortoggle.

Also would be sweet if his sunglasses went on when his ult landed. Just a little detail but would be nice.
I love the "Deal with it" Sun ult.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QTOEm0t0,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-06-27T21:53:29.779+0000)
>
> Taric throws off his jacket during his recall.

A_A Yes..l.. thats... yes.
Her E is the coconuts
no speedo? disappointment :<
Fiora is a bitch for kicking that poor,crab

Me: Does not want to spend money
*sees these*
Me: https://media.giphy.com/media/109qivmw8Q6K52/giphy.gif
manly, can't wait to see the splash art for Pool Party MF

> [{quoted}](name=Moonboy65,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QTOEm0t0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-27T19:39:57.911+0000)
>
> manly, can't wait to see the splash art for Pool Party MF

It's to the right, in the background. Along with Fiora.
doubt it, those are too low quality to even zoom in on. Hopefully all 3 splash arts will just have cameos of eachother.

> [{quoted}](name=Mcprowlington,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QTOEm0t0,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-27T20:19:01.130+0000)
>
> doubt it, those are too low quality to even zoom in on. Hopefully all 3 splash arts will just have cameos of eachother.

OP added in the models that Moobeat and co have dug up. That's them in the background too.

yes. i'm not arguing that that it's representing those characters in those skins. But when they do multiple characters in a single splashart like that each character has to be featured and detailed enough to actually get a clear idea of each individual skin and do it justice while making it look enticing. That's really not the case here.

Guess we'll just have to see.
It was confirmed no shared splash arts, everyone will have their own
uhm hammer? what happened with the mace?

Armor of the Fifth Age has a hammer with roughly that shape.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
oooh I didn't know that.
Riot confirms: Fiora is an animal abuser {{item:3070}}  that poor crab

No pool party Ahri?
 {{item:3070}} {{champion:103}} {{item:3070}}
We can dream, friend.
Shouldn't Fiora be busy dueling Jax instead of hanging out at a resort?
At this point jax isnt even cannon to the lore anymore since he was borderline completely tied to the institute of war down to why he uses the lamppost
Everyone needs a vacation, plus she duels a crab
Miss Fortune is wearing more clothing in her Pool Party skin than in her classic skin... What?
You don't HASSEL the HOFF!

I'm not sure where to leave this feedback but could his shorts perhaps be... shorter? They look frumpy  and somewhat obtrusive to life guard duties. Not to mention, Taric is a style conscious man. I don't think he would be caught dead in board shorts.
uhh pool party talon?{{item:3070}}

I second this, lets get it goin. He can stab people with a kickboard.
